Hymn.Arabic: فرحت بالقائِلينَ لي ، إلَى بَيْتِ الرَّتِ نَذْهَبْ
Hymn.English: 122:1 I was glad when they said to me, Let us go into the house of the Lord.

Hymn.Arabic: وَقَفَتْ أَرْجُلْنا ، في ديار أورُشَلِيمَ. هَلِلُويَا.
Hymn.English: 2 Our feet have been standing Within your gates, O Jerusalem!.
